alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Pulaski (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 11:49AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Dodge and southeastern Pulaski Counties through 1215 PM EDT... At 1149 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Union, or near Eastman. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Union and Five Points. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
